name: jean-claude
description: Sync Claude Code configuration across machines using Git. Keep your CLAUDE.md, settings.json, and hooks synchronized via Git repositories.

repository_url.description: Git repository URL for configuration storage (e.g., https://github.com/user/my-claude-config.git)

tools.name: sync_init
tools.description: Initialize Jean-Claude with a Git repository URL

tools.name: sync_push
tools.description: Push local Claude configuration changes to Git repository

tools.name: sync_pull
tools.description: Pull and apply Claude configuration from Git repository

tools.name: sync_status
tools.description: Check synchronization status between local and repository
